data.comment: The big names in today's match at Adams Park have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at Adams Park - Sheffield Wed kick-off to start the match.
In the minute 32, Callum Paterson (Sheffield Wed) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The first-half is over at Adams Park.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through David Wheeler.
In the minute 46, It's Wycombe with the kick-off after the break.
At Adams Park, Callum Paterson has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Matt Bloomfield is replacing Dennis Adeniran for Wycombe at Adams Park.
In the minute 60, Garry Monk is making the team's first substitution at Adams Park with Isaiah Brown replacing Kadeem Harris.
The away team have replaced Joey Pelupessy with Elias Kachunga. This is the second substitution made today by Garry Monk.
Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's second substitution at Adams Park with Fred Onyedinma replacing David Wheeler.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Adebayo Akinfenwa with Uche Ikpeazu. This is the third substitution made today by Gareth Ainsworth.
Garry Monk (Sheffield Wed) is making a third substitution, with Jordan Rhodes replacing Jack Marriott.
Keith Stroud blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
